item.title: Improving climate model skill over High Mountain Asia by adapting snow cover parameterization to complex-topography areas

item.title: RIVE / ECCC CRD seminar: From ORCHIDEE to CLASSIC: improving the simulated snow cover heterogeneity and its impact on the climate
item.description: The same talk was given for the ECCC Toronto CRD seminar on November 9, 2023 and for the RIVE seminar on December 13, 2023.
